alert.note: Alert for Dimmit (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 5:19PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Dimmit County through 600 PM CDT... At 518 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gilson Groves, or 22 miles south of Big Wells, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gilson Groves, Light and Catarina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
